A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a HUGE Star Wars fan and was very hyped for this movie. Though it did have a few issues and minor plot holes it did justice to the saga. As for characters\, some were amazing in TLJ and some were pointless. Overall I loved this movie and without spoiling it had great plot twists and some great story arcs. The special effects and music were beautifully done as always and most performances were also great
